availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tolbert Y. Gordon (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky native. Married to Melissa M. Leach Gordon in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on April 23, 1857. Father of David L. Gordon, Avarilla Gordon, and William Gordon. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 55A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 705-6.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Seminary, p. 145B-146A.

Find A Grave, "Tolbert Y. Gordon (1830-1901)," Memorial #140707197, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/140707197 (accessed October 19, 2020).
